wiki.content:
"My Sacrifice" is a single released by the American post-grunge band Creed on their album Weathered in 2001. The song peaked at #4 on the Billboard Hot 100 singles chart on February 9, 2002, after reaching the Top 10 on December 29, 2001, and #1 on the Mainstream Rock Tracks chart for 9 consecutive weeks, starting in December 2001. It was featured in a series of promotional tribute videos made by World Wrestling Entertainment
        
User-contributed text is available under the Creative Commons By-SA License and may also be available under the GNU FDL.

The song peaked at #4 on the Billboard Hot 100 singles chart on February 9, 2002, after reaching the Top 10 on December 29, 2001, and #1 on the Mainstream Rock Tracks chart for 9 consecutive weeks, starting in December 2001. It was featured in a series of promotional tribute videos made by World Wrestling Entertainment

track.name: My Sacrifice
comments: still one of the best songs ever !!
good.

Love this track.  I find it funny as I read the post's here, I see a lot of "brings back memories" posted from almost everyone.  I was just thinking that when I here that statement, I go back to late 60's and the 70's.

Well I guess, when it's good it really doesn't matter 'when' it came from.  It just matter's that it's here.

Rock ON
